item.title: Content Federation on the Internet
item.description: An old dream of mine is to be part of a social internet and to have a protocol or an infastructure that lets me keep contact with the many parties of the internet that I’m interested in.

item.title: Org-Mode Powered AngularJS Boilerplate
item.description: This is my custom angular.js boilerplate Setup based on Emacs’s Org Mode and it´s impressive tangle functionality. You can load this page´s org source code in Emacs and start playing around with angular.
